course.title: Java Development with XDoclet

programs.program: Graduate in Complementary Studies in Applied Informatics: Java Development for the Enterprise

course.tagline: XDoclet is a metadata-driven, code generation engine for Java.
course.description: Are you tired of writing the same Java code, over and over again? XDoclet will take the burden of repetitive development tasks off your shoulders by automating them. Starting from simple JavaDoc-style comments, XDoclet generates deployment descriptors, interfaces, framework classes and other utility classes your project requires. In the course you'll learn how to use XDoclet with EJBs, Servlets, JMX, and other technologies. You will learn how to write less code, how to keep your application components in sync, and how to keep your deployment, interface, utility and other information all in one place.
